H0.text: Which 1987 US film was based on the 1985 French film ‘Trois hommes et un couffin’. Like Father, Like Son

H1.text: Which 1987 US film was based on the 1985 French film ‘Trois hommes et un couffin’. Overboard

H2.text: Which 1987 US film was based on the 1985 French film ‘Trois hommes et un couffin’. Blind Date

H3.text: Which 1987 US film was based on the 1985 French film ‘Trois hommes et un couffin’. 3 Men and a Baby

A4.text: Trois hommes et un couffin was remade by Hollywood in English as Three Men and a Baby in 1987
